title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Simbrief - planning your flights
description:
In our previous video, we delved into AIRACs and briefly mentioned the available flight planning tools, including Simbrief. As we promised in the AIRAC video, we're going to take a closer look at these tools. This video will guide you through the process of creating a flight plan for use in a flight simulator with Simbrief.

0:00 intro
0:10 starting with Simbrief
1:37 Simbrief Dashboard
2:10 Get started creating the flight plan
2:25 Flight plan: flight info section: departure/arrival
5:48 Flight plan: flight info section: weather
10:08 Flight plan: aircraft info section
15:52 Flight plan: selections: settings
19:16 Flight plan: optional entries section: calculating takeoff performance
23:18 Flight plan: fuel planning section
24:08 Flight plan: text entries section
24:22 Flight plan: route section
25:41 Flight plan: suggested routes section
26:23 Flight plan: route finder section
26:59 Flight plan: alternate airports section
27:03 Flight plan: ETOPS scenario section
27:31 Reading the OFP
36:46 Generating the flight plan
38:44 Download the flight plan
40:03 Prefiling flight plan for online services
41:42 close out
